test_scenarios.name: Auto-approval test
test_scenarios.expected: Status changes to auto_approved after cron runs

deliverables.query_to_find_id: SELECT cd.id, cd.campaign_id, cd.creator_id, cd.status, cd.submitted_at, cd.auto_approved_at FROM campaign_deliverables cd JOIN creator_profiles cp ON cd.creator_id = cp.id JOIN users u ON cp.user_id = u.id WHERE u.email = 'creator1@troodieapp.com' ORDER BY cd.created_at DESC LIMIT 1;
